item.title: Quick Facts about Shuojiang Liu
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ðŸ‘‹ðŸ‘‹ The following informal content can help you quickly understand Shuojiang Liu! He never smokes. He never consumes alcohol and disapproves of “drinking table culture.” He rarely drinks coffee. He abhors entertainment that is hypocritical. He seldom ever updates any changes to either his QQ Space or WeChat Moments. Lu Xun and Dostoyevsky are his favorite authors. He speaks Mandarin and English fluently and is currently planning to learn Japanese. He enjoys watching 2D animation, and his favorite animation studio is GAINAX.
